```python
import boto3, json, time

)
```

## Why This Is Asked

Tests disaster recovery in AWS with a beginner-friendly cross-region flow and DNS-based failover.

## Key Concepts

- Cross-region artifact replication
- Route 53 health checks and failover routing
- Minimal CloudFormation for multi-region setups
- CI/CD coordination across regions
- Safe failover testing and rollback

## Code Example

```yaml
AWSTemplateFormatVersion: '2010-09-09'
Resources:
  EastHealthCheck:
    Type: AWS::Route53::HealthCheck
    Properties:
      HealthCheckConfig:
        Type: HTTP
        FullyQualifiedDomainName: api-east.example.com
        Port: 80
        ResourcePath: /
        Interval: 30
        FailureThreshold: 3
  EastRecord:
    Type: AWS::Route53::RecordSet
    Properties:
      Name: api.example.com
      Type: A
      SetIdentifier: East
      Failover: PRIMARY
      TTL: 60
      HealthCheckId: !Ref EastHealthCheck
  WestHealthCheck:
    Type: AWS::Route53::HealthCheck
    Properties:
      HealthCheckConfig:
        Type: HTTP
        FullyQualifiedDomainName: api-west.example.com
        Port: 80
        ResourcePath: /
        Interval: 30
        FailureThreshold: 3
  WestRecord:
    Type: AWS::Route53::RecordSet
    Properties:
      Name: api.example.com
      Type: A
      SetIdentifier: West
      Failover: SECONDARY
      TTL: 60
      HealthCheckId: !Ref WestHealthCheck
```

- How would you automate failover testing in CI/CD?
- What data-consistency concerns arise during cross-region failover?

```yaml
    Type: AWS::ECS::Service
    Properties:
      DeploymentController:
        Type: CODE_DEPLOY
      LoadBalancers:
        - TargetGroupArn: !Ref BlueTargetGroup
          ContainerName: my-app
          ContainerPort: 80

  BlueTargetGroup:
    Type: AWS::ElasticLoadBalancingV2::TargetGroup
    Properties:
      HealthCheckPath: /health
      HealthCheckIntervalSeconds: 30
      HealthCheckTimeoutSeconds: 5
      HealthyThresholdCount: 2

  GreenTargetGroup:
    Type: AWS::ElasticLoadBalancingV2::TargetGroup
    Properties:
      HealthCheckPath: /health
      HealthCheckIntervalSeconds: 30
      HealthCheckTimeoutSeconds: 5
      HealthyThresholdCount: 2

  DeploymentGroup:
    Type: AWS::CodeDeploy::DeploymentGroup
    Properties:
      ApplicationName: !Ref ECSApplication
      DeploymentConfigName: CodeDeployDefault.ECSCanary10Percent5Minutes
      ServiceRoleArn: !Ref CodeDeployRole
      DeploymentStyle:
        DeploymentType: BLUE_GREEN
        DeploymentOption: WITH_TRAFFIC_CONTROL
      BlueGreenDeploymentConfiguration:
        TerminateBlueInstancesOnDeploymentSuccess: true
        DeploymentReadyOption:
          ActionOnTimeout: CONTINUE_DEPLOYMENT
        GreenFleetProvisioningOption:
          Action: DISCOVER_EXISTING
      AlarmConfiguration:
        Alarms:
          - Name: !Ref HealthCheckAlarm
          - Name: !Ref ErrorRateAlarm
        AlarmAction: ROLLBACK_DEPLOYMENT

  HealthCheckAlarm:
    Type: AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm
    Properties:
      MetricName: HealthyHostCount
      Namespace: AWS/ApplicationELB
      Statistic: Minimum
      Threshold: 1
      ComparisonOperator: LessThanThreshold
      EvaluationPeriods: 2

  ErrorRateAlarm:
    Type: AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm
    Properties:
      MetricName: HTTPCode_Target_5XX_Count
      Namespace: AWS/ApplicationELB
      Statistic: Sum
      Threshold: 10
      ComparisonOperator: GreaterThanThreshold
      EvaluationPeriods: 2
```

```terraform
    dynamodb_table = \"terraform-locks-prod\"

}
```
